Polyv (Yifang Information Technology Co., Ltd.), a leading enterprise-level video SaaS brand, is dedicated to building autonomous private domain live streaming systems for enterprises through integrable and customizable live streaming technologies. They also provide comprehensive operational services and on-site execution for the entire live streaming process.

Their core product matrix includes Cloud Live Streaming, Cloud Video On Demand, Cloud Classroom, Private Cloud Video, and Live Streaming Booths.

Since its establishment in 2013, Polyv has served over 250,000 enterprise-level users, with a particular focus on the corporate training sector by constructing exclusive live streaming systems for corporate universities. They have deeply engaged with industries such as education, finance, healthcare, automotive, real estate, and B2B, successfully implementing more than 6 million live streaming events. Notably, they have been providing live streaming services for CCTV's Spring Festival Gala consecutively for six years. Additionally, Polyv has offered video live streaming services to significant enterprises and institutions like the Central Party School, People's Bank of China, Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, China Construction Bank, Bank of China, Tsinghua University, Peking University, New Oriental, JD.com, Midea, and others.
